name: Forgery
description:
Forgery is a card game based on focus and deceit. Each player must complete a task while also paying attention to other players' actions in order to win.  The virtual game allows up to 3 players, but can easily be modified to have more players off of the game screen.  It is a short card game and can be played fairly quickly depending on the skills each player applies.  Grab some friends and see who can create the best Forgery.

Play here:
